description: Jai Rowe's late goal fired relegation-battling Boston to a 2-1 National League victory at Aldershot.
title: Aldershot Town 1-2 Boston United
title_page: Aldershot Town 1-2 Boston United: Match report - BBC Sport
maintext:
Jai Rowe's late goal fired relegation-battling Boston to a 2-1 National League victory at Aldershot.
Kwame Thomas and Ollie Bray combined to enable Tyler Frost to open the scoring for the home side a minute before the interval.
But James Gale was on target in the 72nd minute for Boston to set up a nervy finish to the clash.
Rowe then struck one minute into added time to win it.
